body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos! This is Samuel Roberts speaking. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Samuel. My name is Sharon Watson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sharon! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in purchasing a car and wanted to know more about your financing options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, I can help with that. May I have a contact number where you can be reached?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is six one four five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon. And could you also provide me with an email address where we can send you more information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my email is sharon.watson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, Sharon! I'll send you the detailed financing options shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sharon. Thank you for your time and I hope you find the perfect car with us at Vincenzo's Benzos. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Samuel Roberts and the customer's name is Sharon Watson.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
